pr_title: Store Procedure execution fails and does not return data back to mule flow

timeline.message: Fixed StatementResultIterator.hasNext that was always true for stored procedures and resulted in OutOfMemoryException

timeline.bodyText: You are calling statement.getUpdateCount() twice in the same read. I think this change the statement state, so the second time it maybe will read again.
timeline.author: csimonelli

timeline.bodyText: I think it needs a test with a recordset with more than 1 result.
timeline.author: csimonelli

timeline.message: statement.getUpdatedCount is now called only once.
